desc: The Best Available Hitch on the Market! With a max load capacity of either 10,000, 12,000, 14,000 or 16,000 pounds, the Rhino Hitch is ideal for the days out on the lake in your fishing boat, or haul the pop up trailer to the hills for a relaxing weekend of camping.

layout.text:
NICE TRUCK, BUT
YOUR HITCH
SUCKS!!!!

JOIN THE RHINO HITCH FAMILY!

AND FACEBOOK FOR NEW CONTENT!
